articles.title: Black patients with systemic sclerosis may experience poorer outcomes more often than others - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: New research presented this week at ACR Convergence, the American College of Rheumatology's annual meeting, shows that Black people living with systemic sclerosis may have more severe disease and worse prognosis than patients in other racial or ethnic groups,…

articles.title: Delta plus variant found in 8 states - WJW FOX 8 News Cleveland
articles.description: A small fraction of COVID cases in the United States over the last several weeks have been linked to delta plus, and American health officials are working to study it.
articles.content:
